name: Diplomacy
documentation:
Defines the diplomatic relationship of a player to another one.

*Note*:Defaults to neutral if not defined.

parameters.name: PlayerIdThis
parameters.documentation: The player to modify the view of the other player of.

parameters.name: PlayerIdOther
parameters.documentation: The target player of the relationship.
